Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz scored the decisive goal after seven minutes
Romelu Lukaku had two goals disallowed by VAR
Jérémy Doku had a costly mistake leading to the Slovakia goal
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco refused to blame VAR for the defeat
Romelu Lukaku's performance was puzzling and reminiscent of his performance in the 2022 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Frankfurt Arena
Jérémy Doku's first touch set off a slaloming run that ended with a Lukaku shot being saved by Martin Dubravka
Others: Belgium's golden generation is losing its luster
Ivan Schranz scored the only goal of the match
Slovakia's team lacked pace but had steel and organization
